testcase.name: should format the number in correct format.
should not format the number if provided value is 3 or less digits.
should start formatting on 4th digit input.
should remove formatting on 4th digit removal.
should start add hyphen on 7th digit input and not before that and remove on 7th digit removal.
should maintain formatting on if one digit is swapped by selecting a character and should maintain caret position
should not accept any value after 10 digits
should show the caret on right position after more than 1 characters removed by selection.
